title: Simulation-Based Leadership Language Training for Senior Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic job-related language proficiency and managerial experience
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented environment using digital devices, language learning simulations, and VR role-playing scenarios.

learning_goals: After completing the training, learners can accurately utilize advanced language expressions required in work environments at least 80% of the time
Successfully apply communication strategies considering cultural contexts in VR simulation environments three or more times
Effectively perform conflict resolution and decision-making processes in team management scenarios through verbal and non-verbal communication at least 70% of the time
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
